description:
Welcome to PyOhio!

Here are some important links for you to check out before we get
started:

-  `Code of Conduct`_
-  `Chat on Discord`_
-  `T-Shirts`_ – available through August 4!
-  `Volunteering`_ for next year

.. _Code of Conduct: https://www.pyohio.org/conduct
.. _Chat on Discord: https://chat.pyohio.org
.. _T-Shirts: https://pyohio.org/shirts
.. _Volunteering: https://pyohio.org/volunteer
title: PyOhio 2022 Opening Remarks
